title: UX Designer
description: Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description Job description.
required: 3+ years of delivering design solutions as a UX designer or interaction designer experience
Experience prototyping (HTML, XHTML, JavaScript, CSS, Flash or Flash Catalyst, or Axure)
preferred: 2+ years of mass-market consumer web / mobile products experience
Experience working in a collaborative team and working directly with developers for implementation of designs
responsibilities: Collaborate and work closely with product management, engineering, sales, and research from design concept to design solution, setting UX guidelines and driving cross-team collaboration and sharing, as well as establish best practices for interaction models and user interface design throughout the team.
Work in a start-up style environment, where iteration is encouraged and design acumen is demonstrated through design end-to-end product ownership.

Communicate complex, interactive design concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization through design communication, presentation, interpersonal and analytical skills.
Earn trust with product managers to develop shared vision and use research and data to identify opportunities and inform decisions.

companyInfo.name: Company name
companyInfo.description: Kforce has a client that is seeking a UI/UX Developer in Madison, WI. Overview: In brief, we a handful of AI-powered tools for our workforce which could include anything from enhancing the end-user experience, use cases related to specific scenario, we would love to have someone that has the skills to work directly in our applications. Specific to this one experience (typescript), while being able to help technicians and other colleagues use a legacy code (ASP.NET Python tech stack). We have some advanced Python tech stack, We currently have three tools that users are interacting with; one is an Edge browser extension (Javascript), one is using Streamlit web application (python based), and the other is a basic React web application.

title: Software Engineer, Network Infrastructure
description: Join our team to build and maintain large-scale network infrastructure systems.
required: 5+ years of systems or network engineering experience
Deep familiarity with Linux and networking protocols (BGP, OSPF)
Experience operating Kubernetes clusters at scale
preferred: Prior work with cloud networking (AWS VPC, Transit Gateway)
responsibilities: Design, build, and operate global network infrastructure for low-latency services.
Automate deployment and maintenance of infrastructure using IaC.
Troubleshoot large-scale production incidents and perform postmortems.
Collaborate with product and security teams to ensure robust network design.

benefits.description: Monthly wellness stipend for on-site employees.

benefits.description: Comprehensive medical, dental, and vision plans.

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (Web Developer)
description: Develop web applications for scientific research and data visualization.
required: 4+ years building web applications with React or similar frameworks
Experience with backend web frameworks (Django, Flask, Express)
preferred: Experience with data visualization libraries (D3, Vega)
Prior work in research or academic software projects
responsibilities: Implement UI components and data visualizations for research tools.
Build and maintain backend services and APIs.
Work with researchers to translate requirements into production features.
Maintain code quality with testing and CI/CD practices.

companyInfo.name: Simons Foundation
companyInfo.description: The Simons Foundation supports basic research in mathematics and the basic sciences.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Build responsive and intuitive user interfaces for our SaaS platform.
required: 5+ years frontend experience building production UIs
Strong skills in React and TypeScript
Experience with design systems and accessibility best practices
preferred: Experience with Next.js and server-side rendering
Familiarity with GraphQL and modern data fetching patterns
responsibilities: Lead frontend feature development and mentor junior engineers.
Design and maintain a scalable component library.
Collaborate closely with designers to deliver pixel-perfect UI.

title: Backend Developer
